You have hexproof.
Permanents you own can't be taken control of by your opponents.
{T}: Obscure the top card of your library. [i](To obscure a card, exile it face down. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled on a later turn.)[/i]
{4}: Each player gains control of each permanent they own. Any player may activate this ability.
